video.title: Food Wars!: Shokugeki no Soma
video.synopsis: Young chef Soma enters the prestigious Totsuki Culinary Academy, where he must emerge victorious in over-the-top cooking battles or face expulsion.

episodes.synopsis: Soma Yukihira’s apprenticeship at his father’s restaurant comes to a screeching halt when a land shark threatens to close down the business.
episodes.title: An Endless Wasteland

episodes.synopsis: Everyone aside from Soma runs away when Erina reveals herself as their examiner; Soma must make an egg dish worthy of her superior sense of taste.
episodes.title: God Tongue

episodes.synopsis: Soma earns the wrath of the entire student body at the entrance ceremony when he makes a bold declaration to become the top student at Totsuki.
episodes.title: That Chef Never Smiles

episodes.synopsis: Soma finally arrives at the dormitory, but he must first meet the challenge to impress the dorm supervisor in order to become a resident.
episodes.title: The Madonna of the Polar Star

episodes.synopsis: Soma learns about the rules of the “shokugeki” cooking competition from Satoshi. Meanwhile, Erina goes up against Kiyoshi in a shokugeki.
episodes.title: The Ice Queen and the Spring Storm

episodes.synopsis: Soma challenges Ikumi Mito to a shokugeki when he learns about Erina’s plan to disband a donburi research club for her personal expansion project.
episodes.title: The Meat Invader

episodes.synopsis: Ikumi wins over the crowd with her grade A5 wagyu beef, but Soma gets jeered by the spectators for using discount beef from the supermarket.
episodes.title: The Quiet Don the Eloquent Don

episodes.synopsis: Soma and the other first year Totsuki students head off to a grueling training camp where half of them will end up getting expelled.
episodes.title: The Concerto of Inspiration and Imagination

episodes.synopsis: Soma thinks up a plan when Totsuki alumna Inui assigns a challenge to make a Japanese dish using ingredients found in or around the building.
episodes.title: The Breading to Adorn the Mountains

episodes.synopsis: Soma bumps into Erina on his way to the bath. He apologizes for knocking her down, but Erina refuses his help. At the bath, Soma meets Chef Dojima.
episodes.title: The Heavenly Recette

episodes.synopsis: Soma challenges Chef Shinomiya to a shokugeki to save Megumi from expulsion; Megumi must take the lead and win or Soma will also be expelled.
episodes.title: The Magician from the East

episodes.synopsis: Megumi impresses the judges with her “Rainbow Terrine” made of ripened vegetables, but it might not be enough to win her the competition.
episodes.title: The Memory of a Dish

episodes.synopsis: The next challenge will be judged by hotel guests and staff. Each student must serve 200 of their egg dishes at a breakfast buffet in order to pass.
episodes.title: Eggs Before Dawn

episodes.synopsis: Soma struggles to get the guests to eat his soufflé omelette. With only 30 minutes left on the clock, Soma decides to change his preparation method.
episodes.title: Metamorphosis

episodes.synopsis: Shinomiya heads back to France to work on making his restaurant number one in Paris. Soma returns to his dorm to find an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: The Man Called the Demon

episodes.synopsis: Soma’s father Joichiro was once a legendary student at Totsuki. Joichiro challenges his son to a cooking match to gauge his current progress.
episodes.title: The Chef Who's Crossed a Thousand Leagues

episodes.synopsis: Soma returns home to find that local businesses have been having trouble since a restaurant called Mozuya started taking away their foot traffic.
episodes.title: The Seductive Karaage

episodes.synopsis: Soma and his friends come up with a plan to bring customers back to the neighborhood shopping district by focusing on making portable food.
episodes.title: The Karaage of Youth

episodes.synopsis: After making the cut to compete in the Fall Classic tournament, Soma and Megumi visit the resident spice expert Shiomi to learn more about curries.
episodes.title: The Chosen One

episodes.synopsis: The preliminary round of the Fall Classic kicks off when the first year contestants return after developing their curry dishes over summer break.
episodes.title: The Dragon Lies Down and Ascends the Skies

episodes.synopsis: The students get divided up into Blocks A and B. Megumi unveils an unexpected ingredient as the contestants start cooking in the preliminaries.
episodes.title: The Unknown Known

episodes.synopsis: Megumi presents the judges with the essence of her hometown after the other contestants take turns exhibiting their original curry dishes.
episodes.title: The One Who Surpasses the Ordinary

episodes.synopsis: Judge Natsume Sendawara ruthlessly awards zero points to dish after dish in Block A, until Ryo Kurokiba presents his creation.
episodes.title: The Competition of the Blossoming Individuals

episodes.synopsis: The Fall Classic approaches its climax. Soma presents his fusion curry dish after Akira all but secures the top spot with his 94 points.
episodes.title: The Banquet of Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Soma goes up against Alice’s scientific approach and top-of-the-line equipment as the Fall Classic quarterfinals kicks off with a bento theme.
episodes.title: That Which is Placed Within the Box

episodes.synopsis: The theme of the second match is ramen using pre-prepared noodles. Megumi and Ryo both decide to make seafood soups for the competition.
episodes.title: Interplay of Light & Shadow

episodes.synopsis: The winner of the ramen battle is announced. Championship favorite Akira competes against Erina’s friend Hisako in a clash of the hamburgers.
episodes.title: The Age of Kings

episodes.synopsis: The fourth match suddenly turns into a shokugeki duel; both Takumi and Subaru must come up with their own unique twists to their semifreddo entries.
episodes.title: The Pursuer

episodes.synopsis: Soma’s opponent in the semifinals is Subaru. When Subaru challenges him to a shokugeki, Soma raises the stakes by putting his own career on the line.
episodes.title: The Secret of the First Bite

episodes.synopsis: The beef stew battle begins. Subaru anticipates Soma’s every move thanks to Mitsuru’s notes, but Soma strikes back with his own secret plan.
episodes.title: Morning Shall Come Again

episodes.synopsis: Ryo and Akira compete with Western-style dishes for their semifinal match, but the judges struggle to choose between their equally impressive entries.
episodes.title: Beasts That Devour Each Other

episodes.synopsis: The subject of the final match is pacific saury. Soma worries about his approach when he realizes his competitors have a better eye for the fish.
episodes.title: The Battle That Follows the Seasons

episodes.synopsis: The finalists make Totsuki history as they engage in the first ever three-way battle over the Fall Classic title.
episodes.title: The Sword That Announces Fall

episodes.synopsis: Soma’s deceptively humble pacific saury dish goes up against Ryo’s cartoccio and Akira’s carpaccio. The judges present the winner of the Fall Classic.
episodes.title: A New Jewel

episodes.synopsis: Soma and Hisako are sent to a Western restaurant for the Stagiaire; they must make visible improvements in order to pass the training program.
episodes.title: The Stagiaire

episodes.synopsis: Soma gets sent to train at Shinomiya’s new French restaurant. On the first pre-opening day, he struggles to keep up with the demands in the kitchen.
episodes.title: The Magician Returns

episodes.synopsis: Soma creates an original dish using his newly acquired French cooking techniques on the last day of his Stagiaire at Shinomiya’s restaurant.
episodes.title: Pomp & Circumstance
